issues.title: weak-prng
issues.description: BadLottery.pickWinner(address[]) (contract.sol#22-40) uses a weak PRNG: "randomIndex = uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(block.timestamp,block.prevrandao,players.length))) % players.length (contract.sol#28-36)"
issues.recommendation: Review and apply security best practices

issues.title: locked-ether
issues.description:
Contract locking ether found:
	Contract BadLottery (contract.sol#11-41) has payable functions:
	 - BadLottery.enter() (contract.sol#16-19)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
issues.filename:
Contract locking ether found:
	Contract BadLottery (contract.sol
issues.recommendation: Add withdrawal function or make contract payable

issues.title: solc-version
issues.description:
Version constraint ^0.8.20 contains known severe issues (https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bugs.html)
	- VerbatimInvalidDeduplication
	- FullInlinerNonExpressionSplitArgumentEvaluationOrder
	- MissingSideEffectsOnSelectorAccess.
It is used by:
	- ^0.8.20 (contract.sol#2)
